item.title: CVE-2021-24308|2024-08-03T19:28:23.207Z -- lifterlms -- lms%20by%20lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20online%20course%2C%20membership%20%26%20learning%20management%20system%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The 'State' field of the Edit profile page of the LMS by LifterLMS â€“ Online Course, Membership & Learning Management System Plugin for WordPress plugin before 4.21.1 is not properly sanitised when output in the About section of the profile page, leading to a stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. This could allow low privilege users (such as students) to elevate their privilege via an XSS attack when an admin will view their profile.

item.title: CVE-2024-31363|2024-07-31T15:48:38.797Z -- lifterlms -- lifterlms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in LifterLMS.This issue affects LifterLMS: from n/a through 7.5.0.
